Text: T to the R to the U-T-H

T to the R to the U-T-H 
 How did we meet? 
 Online. Unseen. 
 How did we greet? 
 A meme. An emoji 
 It felt only you saw 
 what many never see 
 You DM-ed that you 
 Believed in Me!

So even after logic 
 And all the theory 
 I switched on the camera 
 So you could be with me

Now I can’t talk to anyone 
 Not even my diary 
 I have to hide behind 
 So no one places me filters

When the Judge spoke sacred verse 
 “Compensation. Courage. Support” 
 I realised karma still works! 
 Bengal. Midnapore. Tamluk Court.

Dispensing what’s been caging me 
 #WomenShould #IWillGoOut 
 #GenerationEquality 
 #MeToo #YesAllWomen #HeForShe 
 Allowing me to rest again peacefully

T to the R to the U-T-H 
 How did we meet? 
 Online. Aware. 
 How did we greet? 
 A hello. An answer 
 I knew you only saw 
 What I’d let you see 
 Before you DM-ed  
 I believed in Me!
DO: If you hear - It’s always been so - question; intervene.
